example.eg: Before you plant seeds, you need to prepare the ground.
example.egtrans: 在播种之前，你需要把地准备好。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…准备好, 使作准备

example.eg: Nothing could have prepared me for the sight that greeted me when I opened the door.
example.egtrans: 我根本没有做好准备，接受一开门看见的一幕。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使…准备好, 使…做好准备

example.eg: She got the board out and prepared the pieces for a game of chess.
He prepared a wonderful meal for us.
example.egtrans: 他为我们做了一顿可口的饭菜。

example.eg: I am coming out soon - I just need a minute to prepare.
example.egtrans: 我马上出来，我只需要一分钟作准备。

example.eg: Simon has spent all day preparing for his guests' arrival.
example.egtrans: 西蒙一整天都在为客人的到来做准备。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 准备好做, 做好准备做

example.eg: Why don't you take out the garbage while I prepare the food.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 准备食物, 做东西吃

example.eg: I've already prepared my tools for use so as to save time later.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 准备…的样本, 制备…的样本

example.eg: The economic agreements were used to prepare the ground for full political collaboration.
Older children often prepare the way for their younger siblings, who are given more freedom and fewer responsibilities.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 为…铺路，扫清道路，奠定基础，做好准备

example.eg: I'm all packed for the move, but I still have to prepare myself mentally for the change.
